value.halfverse:
and so made the foundation of his work,
most humbly and most pure, in the Virgin’s womb.
value.verse: God chose to be our mother in all things *
God, the perfect wisdom of all, *
value.halfverse: arrayed himself in this humble place.

value.verse: Christ came in our poor flesh *
Our mothers bear us for pain and for death; *
value.halfverse: our true mother, Jesus, bears us for joy and endless life.
until the full time of his passion.
value.verse: Christ carried us within him in love and travail, *

value.halfverse: still all this could not satisfy the power of his wonderful love.
value.verse: And when all was completed and he had carried us so for joy, *

value.halfverse:
for the love of Christ works in us;
Christ is the one whom we love.
value.verse: All that we owe is redeemed in truly loving God, *
